alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHEYENNE AND SOUTHERN MORRILL COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sidney, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Dalton, Gurley, Colton, Brownson and Sidney Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 46 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
